front.title: CLI forwarding method during call transfer

abstract.t: Many telephony services are IP based and they can use varioussignaling protocols like H.323, SIP, MGCP, MEGACO and vendorproprietary protocols. This document describe a method to identifyand to change the Calling Line Identification (or CLI) field duringcall forwarding. This method is voice over ip protocol independent.This method can be apply to all voice over ip protocols.
